articles.author: John Paul Ging
articles.title: Coronavirus in your eyes: risk is higher due to strength of strain say researchers - Euronews
articles.description: Researchers based in Hong Kong say that COVID-19 infection via the eyes is a greater risk than before because it is stronger than previous coronaviruses - but hand hygiene rather than protective eyewear still remains paramount.
